tool.name: SAGA.pj_georeference.6
tool.description: World File from Flight and Camera Settings
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayFILE False output_data_EXTENT $output_data_EXTENT name SAGA.pj_georeference.6 FILE $FILE NX $NX NY $NY X $X Y $Y Z $Z ORIENTATION $ORIENTATION OMEGA $OMEGA PHI $PHI KAPPA $KAPPA KAPPA_OFF $KAPPA_OFF CFL $CFL PXSIZE $PXSIZE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_EXTENT $OutputSection_EXTENT.outputType_EXTENT transmissionMode_EXTENT $OutputSection_EXTENT.transmissionMode_EXTENT

param.name: FILE
param.label: World File
param.help: World File The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_EXTENT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_EXTENT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Creates a world file (RST = rotation, scaling, translation) for georeferencing images by direct georeferencing. Direct georeferencing uses extrinsic (position, attitude) and intrinsic (focal length, physical pixel size) camera parameters.<br/><br/>References:<br/>Baumker, M. / Heimes, F.J. (2001): New Calibration and Computing Method for Direct Georeferencing of Image and Scanner Data Using the Position and Angular Data of an Hybrid Inertial Navigation System. OEEPE Workshop, Integrated Sensor Orientation, Hannover 2001. <a target="_blank" href="http://www.hochschule-bochum.de/fileadmin/media/fb_v/veroeffentlichungen/baeumker/baheimesoeepe.pdf">online</a>.<br/>
